name: 7.9 "Send in the Crane" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 7 | 10 Questions

questions.text: When Frasier did word association with Woody, what did Woody say after Frasier said the word "bottom"?
questions.explanation:
thermostat.

	Fraiser tried to figure out why Woody made this association. He thought that perhaps that thermostat was hard to spell and Woody was at the bottom of his class. Woody said no. Then Rebecca came in to turn down the thermostat and when she bent over, Woody was checking out her bottom.

questions.text: Who did Frasier forget to pick up at the airport?
questions.explanation:
Lilith.

	Fraiser had been so preoccupied that he totally forgot to pick up Lilith. Lilith wasn't angry with him, however.

French underwear.

	There was hardly anything to this pair of underwear. Frasier agreed however to try them on so he went into the bathroom and put them on.

questions.text: Who originally was going to be the clown at the kiddie party Rebecca had to throw?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Woody was very excited about this. He said he had always wanted to be a clown.

questions.text: Who did Sam date in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Judy.

	Judy was played by Sandahl Bergman. She appeared in many Bob Fosse works.

questions.text: What was the name of Sam's date's daughter?
questions.explanation:
Laurie.

	Laurie was played by Chelsea Noble. Chelsea Noble married Kirk Cameron on July 21, 1991.

questions.text: Who did Woody squirt with the flower?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	They didn't think Woody's joke book was very funny. Then Woody showed them the flower along with a joke and they all laughed, mainly because it was Cliff that got squirted with water.

questions.text: Who ended up being the clown?
questions.explanation:
Frasier.

	When Woody said he couldn't be a clown because he got a part in the play, Rebecca told Frasier, "You owe me a clown!". Carla reminded Frasier that he said he envied Woody, so Frasier agreed to be the clown.

questions.text: What part of the clown outfit did Woody forget to give the person filling in as the clown?
questions.explanation:
polka-dotted shorts.

	Woody said the best trick of all was when he pulled out the handkerchief and the pants fell down. He then realized he was wearing the shorts and told Carla to call and tell Frasier. Carla never called but luckily Woody called himself to make sure Frasier knew. He called late however and it was pure luck that Frasier never pulled out the handkerchief as all he was wearing were the French underwear.

Binky.

	At the end, one of the older women at the party sneezed. Frasier forgot about the handkerchief trick and gave her his hanky.
